title: Ross Ulbricht
summary: Ross William Ulbricht (born March 27, 1984) is an American who created and operated the darknet market website Silk Road from 2011 until his arrest in 2013.[3] The site used Tor for anonymity and bitcoin as a currency and facilitated the sale of narcotics and other illegal sales.[4][5]  One of Ulbricht's online pseudonyms was "Dread Pirate Roberts" after the fictional character in the novel The Princess Bride and its film adaptation.
